tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was explained in details why in my case normal braces were not an option and i should instead opt for the Invisalign braces. This was rather very helpful in taking a concrete decision for my treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited this place for my son Hillol's dental problem. He has misaligned jaws.. they call it deep bite or  something like this. We have been  explained regarding the problem and possible remedies.  We were in the search such clinic where we would get comprehensive treatment under one roof. I think finally we have found one.  The doctor has a very good team of young doctors. In the first sitting my son got his teeth cleaned. A young lady doctor did it very carefully and patiently without hurting. Then another pair of young doctors patiently  took digital imagery of entire mouth cavity which is part of the procedure. I hope to receive similar care in the course of my son's treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I was in immense pain due to my wisdom tooth. One of my friend recommended Dr. Anshuman bhattacharya to me. Immediately I took the earliest appointment. The service was very prompt and fast. Sir explained to me my concerned condition. I had pretty less time in hand, he readily accepted to do my extraction in the same day. The staff are very hospitalable and helpful. The extraction went very smooth. Even now after the 1day extraction I have hardly have any pain. ******* ***** ** *** ******* hospitalable staff , very good environment.I would highly recommend to avail any dental service from them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I went there for my braces treatment after looking at lots of reviews on the net. However, he just suggests the Invisalign slingers ***** ***** ****** *** ****** There are no other options like ceramic or metal braces which he can help you with. Takes very little time to explain the issue and spends a lot of time trying to push you to go ahead with the invisible alingers.  A doctor should give an unbiased opinion on the treatment options available.
The staff at this clinic are very helpful and cordial though!
reply_text: This Orthodontic centre provides all forms of braces. We will always recommend the best for our patients. Treatment options are selected considering his/her age, malocclusion type, oral hygiene status and patient's convenience and time frame the patient has for the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: The team of doctors are very friendly and the appointment flexibility is superb. It helps me attending my school and study without any problem.
Very high price. Not friendly at all. Not recommended. Visit showing in practo is rs. 900 but when I went there they charged r 1200. ***** ***************
reply_text: Dear Mr. Banik, Greetings from Mission Smile Dental Centre. We take your feedback positively. And we are here to help you and give you more options which will be more cost effective.  The treatment plan given to you is fpr full mouth dental implant and rehabilitaion in which more options can be provided. And regarding your fees  you booked for general dental consultation which starts from Rs. 900. But after checking you we did a detailed 40 minutes dental implant consultation with all explanations which is Rs.1200. Wishing you the very best with your dental health always. Regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Mission smile needs no introduction. We have been going there since long. What has impressed me most was the safety precautions taken ever since Covid  has happened. In those days people were scared to go to  hospitals leave alone visitng a dentist. Mission smile has made everlasting impression since then.  My family's Absolute go to for any dental issues. I have left Kavishs braces treatment entirely in the hands of Dr.  Angshuman, for i trust him and his team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I am a patient of his for over 8 years now. I  had a severe resistant skeletal deep bite and crowding of my teeth together with abnormally slow eruption pattern of my permanent teeth with delayed dental age. Doctor with Severe Patience treated me or is rather treating me and the results have been great.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I got to know this doctor through another dentist. From the very beginning of my visit to him, I got calm down by his professional words, amiable attitude and friendly smile. Although the sum of money is not small, the treatment I got from him and the appliance I received from the US, the instruction and guide  from  the doctor, are all very good. What's more, he is very friendly to my parent which makes me very good. 
The assistants of the clinic are friendly as well. The condition of the clinic is neaty and clean, all of these comtribute  the positive image of the clinic. 
I will introduce others to visit this clinic if necessary.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: It was too expensive. This clinic is not for a poor people. They took Rs.2100 for a single teeth surgery. The doctor was very rude. The other staff was friendly.
reply_text: It was a wisdom tooth removal which was done painlessly.  You were saying over telephone that that your mother is in severe pain. We opened the clinic to do the emergency extraction to alleviate your pain. Kindly appreciate the fact that we opened the clinic calling limited staff just to give relief to your mother. If completion of Covid19 safety declaration came across as being rude to you then you should understand that its a social responsibilty of all to speak the truth. We hope that we could give respite to your mother from acute pain by providing the services in this hour of crisis by taking special permits to travel and come in for this. Rs 900 was the consultation and Rs1200 for WISDOM TOOTH REMOVAL with PPE measures and that is a very standard charge in a clinic which maintains strict protocols of sterilisation and safety measures. And all our patients are equally important to us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I am very happy with the treatment so far. Doctors and supporting staff is friendly. Center is following all covid precautions which gives me a lot of comfort to get the dental treatment done during this uncertain times.
